PlaceholderDesc_Id: Unique Id of the choice. This is only unique for this list not globally.
PlaceholderDesc_Condition: Condition string if a condition is associated with the choice. If no choice is associated this will be null
PlaceholderDesc_UnescapedText: Text of the choice without using the escape settings
PlaceholderDesc_IsRepeatable: true if the choice can be selected multiple times, else false
PlaceholderDesc_ChildNode: Node that will be run if the choice is selected
